attributes.action: Make summer holiday shorter for special needs children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The summer holiday should be shorter than 6 weeks kids are bored by week 3. Special needs children especially those with Autism or Autistic traits can't understand simple changes to their routine let alone 6 weeks to some special needs children the 6 weeks holiday can set them right back and upset them so much they are still effected long after they go back in September.
